059@RequiredArgsConstructor
060@Slf4j
061public class SQLQueryVisitor<S extends SearchParameter> implements QueryVisitor {
062
063  private static final String CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR = " AND ";
064  private static final String DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR = " OR ";
065  private static final String EQUALS_OPERATOR = " = ";
066  private static final String IN_OPERATOR = " IN";
067  private static final String GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR = " > ";
068  private static final String GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR = " >= ";
069  private static final String LESS_THAN_OPERATOR = " < ";
070  private static final String LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR = " <= ";
071  private static final String NOT_OPERATOR = "NOT ";
072  private static final String LIKE_OPERATOR = " LIKE ";
073  private static final String IS_NOT_NULL_OPERATOR = " IS NOT NULL";
074  private static final String IS_NULL_OPERATOR = " IS NULL";
075  private static final String IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR = "(%1$s IS NOT NULL AND size(%1$s) > 0)";
076  private static final String IS_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR = "(%1$s IS NULL OR size(%1$s) = 0)";
077  // where query to execute a select all
078  private static final String ALL_QUERY = "true";
079
080  private static final String SQL_ARRAY_PRE = "ARRAY";
081
082  private static final Function<Term, String> ARRAY_FN =
083      t -> "stringArrayContains(" + SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(t) + ",'%s',%b)";
084
085  private static final Function<Term, String> ARRAY_LIKE_FN =
086      t -> "stringArrayLike(" + SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(t) + ",'%s',%b)";
087
088  // TODO: handle derived taxon params for events
089  private static final Set<SearchParameter> TAXON_SEARCH_PARAMETERS =
090      Set.of(
091          OccurrenceSearchParameter.KINGDOM_KEY,
092          OccurrenceSearchParameter.PHYLUM_KEY,
093          OccurrenceSearchParameter.CLASS_KEY,
094          OccurrenceSearchParameter.ORDER_KEY,
095          OccurrenceSearchParameter.FAMILY_KEY,
096          OccurrenceSearchParameter.SUBGENUS_KEY,
097          OccurrenceSearchParameter.GENUS_KEY,
098          OccurrenceSearchParameter.SPECIES_KEY,
099          OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY,
100          OccurrenceSearchParameter.ACCEPTED_TAXON_KEY);
101
102  private static final List<GadmTerm> GADM_GIDS =
103      List.of(GadmTerm.level0Gid, GadmTerm.level1Gid, GadmTerm.level2Gid, GadmTerm.level3Gid);
104
105  private StringBuilder builder;
106
107  private final SQLTermsMapper<S> sqlTermsMapper;
108
109  private final String defaultChecklistKey;
110
111  /** Transforms the value to the SQL statement lower(val). */
112  protected String toSQLLower(String val) {
113    return "lower(" + val + ")";
114  }
115
116  protected String toSQLField(S param, boolean matchCase) {
117    return Optional.ofNullable(term(param))
118        .map(
119            term -> {
120              String sqlCol = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term);
121              if (String.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
122                  && (param != OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOMETRY)
123                  && !matchCase) {
124                return toSQLLower(sqlCol);
125              }
126              return sqlCol;
127            })
128        .orElseThrow(
129            () ->
130                // QueryBuildingException requires an underlying exception
131                new IllegalArgumentException(
132                    "Search parameter " + param.type().getName() + "." + param + " is not mapped"));
133  }
134
135  /**
136   * Allow support for querying the denormalized extension.
137   *
138   * <p>FIXME - this can probably be factored out once all required fields are denormalized.
139   *
140   * @param param
141   * @param matchCase
142   * @return
143   */
144  protected String toSQLDenormField(S param, boolean matchCase) {
145    return Optional.ofNullable(term(param))
146        .map(
147            term -> {
148              if (term instanceof DwcTerm) {
149                DwcTerm dwcTerm = (DwcTerm) term;
150                String field = "Denorm.parents." + dwcTerm.simpleName();
151                if (String.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
152                    && !"GEOMETRY".equals(param.name())
153                    && !matchCase) {
154                  return toSQLLower(field);
155                }
156                return field;
157              }
158              return null;
159            })
160        .orElseThrow(
161            () ->
162                // QueryBuildingException requires an underlying exception
163                new IllegalArgumentException(
164                    "Search parameter " + param + " is not mapped to Hive"));
165  }
166
167  /**
168   * Converts a value to the form expected by Hive based on the SearchParameter. Most values pass by
169   * unaltered. Quotes are added for values that need to be quoted, escaping any existing quotes.
170   *
171   * @param param the type of parameter defining the expected type
172   * @param value the original query value
173   * @return the converted value expected by Hive
174   */
175  protected String toSQLValue(S param, String value, boolean matchCase) {
176    if (Enum.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
177      // all enum parameters are uppercase
178      return '\'' + value.toUpperCase() + '\'';
179    }
180
181    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
182      // use longs for timestamps expressed as ISO dates
183      LocalDate ld = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDate(value);
184      Instant i = ld.atStartOfDay(ZoneOffset.UTC).toInstant();
185      if (isInterpretedUtcDateMilliseconds(term(param))) {
186        return String.valueOf(i.toEpochMilli());
187      } else {
188        return String.valueOf(i.getEpochSecond());
189      }
190
191    } else if (Number.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
192        || Boolean.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
193      // do not quote numbers
194      return value;
195
196    } else {
197      // quote value, escape existing quotes
198      String strVal = '\'' + value.replaceAll("'", "\\\\'") + '\'';
199      if (String.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
200          && !"GEOMETRY".equals(param.name())
201          && !matchCase) {
202        return toSQLLower(strVal);
203      }
204      return strVal;
205    }
206  }
207
208  /**
209   * Translates a valid {@link org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.Download} object and translates it into
210   * a strings that can be used as the <em>WHERE</em> clause for a SQL (hive or spark) download.
211   *
212   * @param predicate to translate
213   * @return WHERE clause
214   */
215  public String buildQuery(Predicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
216    String query = ALL_QUERY;
217    if (predicate != null) { // null predicate means a SELECT ALL
218      builder = new StringBuilder();
219      visit(predicate);
220      query = builder.toString();
221    }
222
223    // Set to null to prevent old StringBuilders hanging around in case this class is reused
224    // somewhere else
225    builder = null;
226    return query;
227  }
228
229  public void visit(ConjunctionPredicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
230    visitCompoundPredicate(predicate, CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
231  }
232
233  public void visit(DisjunctionPredicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
234    // See if this disjunction can be simplified into an IN predicate, which is much faster.
235    // We could overcomplicate this:
236    //   A=1 OR A=2 OR B=3 OR B=4 OR C>5 â†’ A IN(1,2) OR B IN (3,4) OR C>5
237    // but that's a very unusual query for us, so we just check for
238    // - EqualsPredicates everywhere
239    // - on the same search parameter.
240
241    boolean useIn = true;
242    Boolean matchCase = null;
243    List<String> values = new ArrayList<>();
244    S parameter = null;
245    String checklistsKey = null;
246
247    for (Predicate subPredicate : predicate.getPredicates()) {
248      if (subPredicate instanceof EqualsPredicate) {
249        EqualsPredicate<S> equalsSubPredicate = (EqualsPredicate<S>) subPredicate;
250        if (parameter == null) {
251          parameter = equalsSubPredicate.getKey();
252          matchCase = equalsSubPredicate.isMatchCase();
253          checklistsKey = getChecklistKey(equalsSubPredicate.getChecklistKey());
254        } else if (parameter != equalsSubPredicate.getKey()
255            || matchCase != equalsSubPredicate.isMatchCase()
256            || !Objects.equals(
257                checklistsKey, getChecklistKey(equalsSubPredicate.getChecklistKey()))) {
258          useIn = false;
259          break;
260        }
261        values.add(equalsSubPredicate.getValue());
262      } else {
263        useIn = false;
264        break;
265      }
266    }
267
268    if (useIn) {
269      visit(new InPredicate<>(parameter, values, matchCase));
270    } else {
271      visitCompoundPredicate(predicate, DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
272    }
273  }
274
275  public Function<Term, String> getArrayFn() {
276    return ARRAY_FN;
277  }
278
279  /** Supports all parameters incl taxonKey expansion for higher taxa. */
280  public void visit(EqualsPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
281    if (isHumboldtTaxonParameter(predicate.getKey())) {
282      appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(predicate);
283    } else if (TAXON_SEARCH_PARAMETERS.contains(predicate.getKey())) {
284      appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(predicate, GbifInternalTerm.classifications);
285    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXONOMIC_ISSUE) {
286      appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(predicate, GbifTerm.taxonomicIssue);
287    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXONOMIC_STATUS) {
288      appendTaxonomicSingleValueFilter(predicate, GbifInternalTerm.taxonomicStatuses);
289    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID) {
290      appendGadmFilterList(GADM_GIDS, predicate.getValue());
291    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.MEDIA_TYPE) {
292      Optional.ofNullable(VocabularyUtils.lookupEnum(predicate.getValue(), MediaType.class))
293          .ifPresent(
294              mediaType ->
295                  builder.append(
296                      String.format(
297                          getArrayFn().apply(GbifTerm.mediaType), mediaType.name(), true)));
298    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE) {
299      builder.append(
300          String.format(
301              getArrayFn().apply(GbifTerm.issue), predicate.getValue().toUpperCase(), true));
302    } else if (sqlTermsMapper.isArray(predicate.getKey())) {
303      builder.append(
304          String.format(
305              getArrayFn().apply(sqlTermsMapper.getTermArray(predicate.getKey())),
306              predicate.getValue().replaceAll("'", "\\\\'"),
307              predicate.isMatchCase()));
308    } else if (sqlTermsMapper.isDenormedTerm(predicate.getKey())) {
309      builder
310          .append("(")
311          .append("(")
312          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
313          .append(EQUALS_OPERATOR)
314          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
315          .append(") OR (")
316          .append("stringArrayContains(")
317          .append(toSQLDenormField(predicate.getKey(), true))
318          .append(",")
319          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), true))
320          .append("))")
321          .append(")");
322    } else if (SQLColumnsUtils.isVocabulary(term(predicate.getKey()))) {
323      builder.append(
324          String.format(getArrayFn().apply(term(predicate.getKey())), predicate.getValue(), false));
325    } else if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
326      // Dates may contain a range even for an EqualsPredicate (e.g. "2000" or "2000-02")
327      // The user's query value is inclusive, but the parsed dateRange is exclusive of the
328      // upperBound to allow including the day itself.
329      //
330      // I.e. a predicate value 2000/2005-03 gives a dateRange [2000-01-01,2005-04-01)
331      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
332
333      if (dateRange.hasLowerBound() || dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
334        builder.append('(');
335        if (dateRange.hasLowerBound()) {
336          visitSimplePredicate(
337              predicate,
338              GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
339              ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
340          if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
341            builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
342          }
343        }
344        if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
345          visitSimplePredicate(
346              predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
347        }
348        builder.append(')');
349      }
350    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
351      // Dates may contain a range even for an EqualsPredicate (e.g. "2000" or "2000-02")
352      // The user's query value is inclusive, but the parsed dateRange is exclusive of the
353      // upperBound to allow including the day itself.
354      //
355      // I.e. a predicate value 2000/2005-03 gives a dateRange [2000-01-01,2005-04-01)
356      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
357
358      if (dateRange.hasLowerBound() || dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
359        // all the stuff here
360        builder.append('(');
361        if (dateRange.hasLowerBound()) {
362          SimplePredicate predicateGte =
363              new EqualsPredicate<>(
364                  InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_GTE,
365                  predicate.getValue(),
366                  predicate.isMatchCase());
367          visitSimplePredicate(
368              predicateGte,
369              GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
370              ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
371          if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
372            builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
373          }
374        }
375        if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
376          SimplePredicate predicateLte =
377              new EqualsPredicate<>(
378                  InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_LTE,
379                  predicate.getValue(),
380                  predicate.isMatchCase());
381          visitSimplePredicate(
382              predicateLte,
383              LESS_THAN_OPERATOR,
384              ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
385        }
386        builder.append(')');
387      }
388    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME) {
389      if (SearchTypeValidator.isNumericRange(predicate.getValue())) {
390        Range<Double> range = SearchTypeValidator.parseDecimalRange(predicate.getValue());
391        if (range.hasLowerBound()) {
392          builder
393              .append("geologicaltime.gt")
394              .append(GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
395              .append(range.lowerEndpoint());
396        }
397        if (range.hasUpperBound()) {
398          if (range.hasLowerBound()) {
399            builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
400          }
401          builder
402              .append("geologicaltime.lte")
403              .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
404              .append(range.upperEndpoint());
405        }
406      } else {
407        builder
408            .append(predicate.getValue())
409            .append(GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR)
410            .append("geologicaltime.gt")
411            .append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
412            .append(predicate.getValue())
413            .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
414            .append("geologicaltime.lte");
415      }
416    } else {
417      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, EQUALS_OPERATOR);
418    }
419  }
420
421  public void visit(GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
422    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
423      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
424      // "2000" includes all of 2000.
425      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
426      visitSimplePredicate(
427          predicate,
428          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
429          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
430    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
431      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
432      // "2000" includes all of 2000.
433      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
434      SimplePredicate predicateLte =
435          new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(
436              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_LTE, predicate.getValue());
437      visitSimplePredicate(
438          predicateLte,
439          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
440          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
441    } else {
442      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
443    }
444  }
445
446  public void visit(GreaterThanPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
447    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
448      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
449      // range.
450      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the earliest date is 2001-01-01.
451      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
452      visitSimplePredicate(
453          predicate,
454          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
455          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
456    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
457      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
458      // range.
459      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the earliest date is 2001-01-01.
460      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
461      SimplePredicate predicateLte =
462          new GreaterThanPredicate<>(
463              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_LTE, predicate.getValue());
464      visitSimplePredicate(
465          predicateLte,
466          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
467          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
468
469    } else {
470      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR);
471    }
472  }
473
474  public void visit(LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
475    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
476      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
477      // "2000" includes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2001-01-01 (not inclusive).
478      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
479      visitSimplePredicate(
480          predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
481    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
482      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
483      // "2000" includes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2001-01-01 (not inclusive).
484      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
485      SimplePredicate predicateGte =
486          new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(
487              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_GTE, predicate.getValue());
488      visitSimplePredicate(
489          predicateGte, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
490    } else {
491      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
492    }
493  }
494
495  public void visit(LessThanPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
496    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
497      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
498      // range.
499      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2000-01-01 (not inclusive).
500      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
501      visitSimplePredicate(
502          predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
503    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
504      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
505      // range.
506      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2000-01-01 (not inclusive).
507      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
508      SimplePredicate predicateGte =
509          new LessThanPredicate<>(
510              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_GTE, predicate.getValue());
511      visitSimplePredicate(
512          predicateGte, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
513    } else {
514      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR);
515    }
516  }
517
518  public void visit(RangePredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
519    builder.append("((");
520
521    if (!Objects.isNull(predicate.getValue().getGte())) {
522      visitSimplePredicate(
523          new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getGte()),
524          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
525    } else {
526      visitSimplePredicate(
527          new LessThanPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getGt()),
528          GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR);
529    }
530
531    builder.append(")");
532    builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
533    builder.append("(");
534
535    if (!Objects.isNull(predicate.getValue().getLte())) {
536      visitSimplePredicate(
537          new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getLte()),
538          LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
539    } else {
540      visitSimplePredicate(
541          new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getLt()),
542          LESS_THAN_OPERATOR);
543    }
544    builder.append("))");
545  }
546
547  /*
548   * For large disjunctions, IN predicates are around 3Ã— faster than a perfectly balanced tree of
549   * OR predicates, and around 2Ã— faster than a fairly flat OR query.
550   *
551   * With Hive 1.3.0, balancing OR queries should be internal to Hive:
552   *   https://jira.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-11398
553   * but it is probably still better to use an IN, which uses a hash table lookup internally:
554   *   https://jira.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-11415#comment-14651085
555   */
556  public void visit(InPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
557
558    log.info("InPredicate " + predicate);
559
560    boolean isMatchCase = Optional.ofNullable(predicate.isMatchCase()).orElse(Boolean.FALSE);
561
562    if (isSQLArray(predicate.getKey()) || SQLColumnsUtils.isVocabulary(term(predicate.getKey()))) {
563      // Array values must be converted to ORs.
564      builder.append('(');
565      Iterator<String> iterator = predicate.getValues().iterator();
566      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
567        // Use the equals predicate to get the behaviour for array.
568        visit(new EqualsPredicate<S>(predicate.getKey(), iterator.next(), isMatchCase));
569        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
570          builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
571        }
572      }
573      builder.append(')');
574    } else if (isHumboldtTaxonParameter(predicate.getKey())) {
575      appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(predicate);
576    } else if (TAXON_SEARCH_PARAMETERS.contains(predicate.getKey())) {
577      appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(predicate, GbifInternalTerm.classifications);
578    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXONOMIC_ISSUE) {
579      appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(predicate, GbifTerm.taxonomicIssue);
580    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXONOMIC_STATUS) {
581      appendTaxonomicSingleValueFilter(predicate, GbifInternalTerm.taxonomicStatuses);
582    } else if (predicate.getKey().name().equals("GADM_GID")) {
583      // GADM GIDs must be expanded into a disjunction of in predicates
584      appendGadmGidFilter(predicate.getValues());
585    } else if (predicate.getKey().name().equals("EVENT_DATE")) {
586      // Event dates must be expanded into a disjunction of conjunction predicates (of comparisons)
587      builder.append('(');
588      Iterator<String> iterator = predicate.getValues().iterator();
589      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
590        // Use the equals predicate to get the behaviour for event dates.
591        visit(new EqualsPredicate<S>(predicate.getKey(), iterator.next(), isMatchCase));
592        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
593          builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
594        }
595      }
596      builder.append(')');
597
598    } else {
599      builder
600          .append('(')
601          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), isMatchCase))
602          .append(IN_OPERATOR)
603          .append('(');
604      Iterator<String> iterator = predicate.getValues().iterator();
605      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
606        builder.append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), iterator.next(), isMatchCase));
607        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
608          builder.append(", ");
609        }
610      }
611      builder.append(")");
612
613      // this block can be removed in future if we don't need a denormalized
614      // AVRO extension
615      if (sqlTermsMapper.isDenormedTerm(predicate.getKey())) {
616        builder.append(" OR ").append('(');
617
618        Iterator<String> iterator2 = predicate.getValues().iterator();
619        while (iterator2.hasNext()) {
620          builder
621              .append('(')
622              // FIX ME
623              .append("array_contains(")
624              .append(toSQLDenormField(predicate.getKey(), true))
625              .append(',')
626              .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), iterator2.next(), true))
627              .append(')')
628              .append(')');
629          if (iterator2.hasNext()) {
630            builder.append(" OR ");
631          }
632        }
633        builder.append(")");
634      }
635      builder.append(")");
636    }
637  }
638
639  public void visit(LikePredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
640    if (sqlTermsMapper.isArray(predicate.getKey())) {
641      builder.append(
642          String.format(
643              ARRAY_LIKE_FN.apply(sqlTermsMapper.getTermArray(predicate.getKey())),
644              predicate.getValue().replaceAll("'", "\\\\'"),
645              predicate.isMatchCase()));
646    } else {
647      // Replace % â†’ \% and _ â†’ \_
648      // Then replace * â†’ % and ? â†’ _
649      LikePredicate<S> likePredicate =
650          new LikePredicate<>(
651              predicate.getKey(),
652              predicate
653                  .getValue()
654                  .replace("%", "\\%")
655                  .replace("_", "\\_")
656                  .replace('*', '%')
657                  .replace('?', '_'),
658              predicate.isMatchCase());
659
660      visitSimplePredicate(likePredicate, LIKE_OPERATOR);
661    }
662  }
663
664  public void visit(NotPredicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
665    builder.append(NOT_OPERATOR);
666    visit(predicate.getPredicate());
667  }
668
669  public void visit(IsNotNullPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
670    if (isHumboldtTaxonParameter(predicate.getParameter())) {
671      appendHumboldtTaxonUnary(
672          getChecklistKey(predicate.getChecklistKey()), IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR);
673    } else if (isSQLArray(predicate.getParameter())
674        || SQLColumnsUtils.isVocabulary(term(predicate.getParameter()))) {
675      builder.append(
676          String.format(IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true)));
677    } else if (TAXON_SEARCH_PARAMETERS.contains(predicate.getParameter())) {
678      appendTaxonKeyIsNotNull(predicate);
679    } else if (predicate.getParameter() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID) {
680      appendUnaryList(GADM_GIDS, IS_NOT_NULL_OPERATOR);
681    } else {
682      // matchCase: Avoid adding an unnecessary "lower()" when just testing for null.
683      builder.append(toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true));
684      builder.append(IS_NOT_NULL_OPERATOR);
685    }
686  }
687
688  public void visit(IsNullPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
689    if (TAXON_SEARCH_PARAMETERS.contains(predicate.getParameter())) {
690      appendTaxonKeyNull(predicate);
691    } else if (isHumboldtTaxonParameter(predicate.getParameter())) {
692      appendHumboldtTaxonUnary(
693          getChecklistKey(predicate.getChecklistKey()), IS_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR);
694    } else if (predicate.getParameter() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID) {
695      appendUnaryList(GADM_GIDS, IS_NULL_OPERATOR);
696    } else {
697      // matchCase: Avoid adding an unnecessary "lower()" when just testing for null.
698      if (isSQLArray(predicate.getParameter())) {
699        builder.append(
700            String.format(IS_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true)));
701      } else {
702        builder.append(toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true));
703        builder.append(IS_NULL_OPERATOR);
704      }
705    }
706  }
707
708  /** Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank. */
709  private void appendTaxonKeyIsNotNull(IsNotNullPredicate<S> predicate) {
710    builder.append('(');
711    builder.append(
712        String.format(
713            "classificationdetails['%s']['%s'] != ''",
714            getChecklistKey(predicate.getChecklistKey()),
715            predicate.getParameter().name().replace("_", "").toLowerCase()));
716    builder.append(')');
717  }
718
719  /** Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank. */
720  private void appendTaxonKeyNull(IsNullPredicate<S> predicate) {
721    builder.append('(');
722    builder.append(
723        String.format(
724            "classificationdetails['%s']['%s'] = ''",
725            getChecklistKey(predicate.getChecklistKey()),
726            predicate.getParameter().name().replace("_", "").toLowerCase()));
727    builder.append(')');
728  }
729
730  public void visit(WithinPredicate within) throws QueryBuildingException {
731    JtsSpatialContextFactory spatialContextFactory = new JtsSpatialContextFactory();
732    spatialContextFactory.normWrapLongitude = true;
733    spatialContextFactory.srid = 4326;
734    spatialContextFactory.datelineRule = DatelineRule.ccwRect;
735
736    WKTReader reader =
737        new WKTReader(spatialContextFactory.newSpatialContext(), spatialContextFactory);
738
739    try {
740      // the geometry must be valid - it was validated in the predicates constructor
741      Shape geometry = reader.parse(within.getGeometry());
742
743      builder.append('(');
744      String withinGeometry;
745
746      // Add an additional filter to a bounding box around any shapes that aren't quadrilaterals, to
747      // speed up the query.
748      if (geometry instanceof JtsGeometry
749          && ((JtsGeometry) geometry).getGeom().getNumPoints() != 5) {
750        Geometry g = ((JtsGeometry) geometry).getGeom();
751        // Use the Spatial4J-fixed geometry; this is split into a multipolygon if it crosses the
752        // antimeridian.
753        withinGeometry = g.toText();
754
755        Rectangle bounds = geometry.getBoundingBox();
756        boundingBox(bounds);
757        builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
758
759        // A tool (R?) can generate hundreds of tiny areas spread across the globe, all in a single
760        // multipolygon.
761        // Add bounding boxes for these too.
762        // Example: https://www.gbif.org/occurrence/download/0187894-210914110416597
763        if (g instanceof MultiPolygon && g.getNumGeometries() > 2) {
764          builder.append("((");
765          for (int i = 0; i < g.getNumGeometries(); i++) {
766            if (i > 0) {
767              // Too many clauses exceeds Hive's query parsing stack.
768              if (i % 500 == 0) {
769                builder.append(')');
770                builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
771                builder.append('(');
772              } else {
773                builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
774              }
775            }
776            Geometry gi = g.getGeometryN(i);
777            Envelope env = gi.getEnvelopeInternal();
778            boundingBox(
779                new RectangleImpl(
780                    env.getMinX(),
781                    env.getMaxX(),
782                    env.getMinY(),
783                    env.getMaxY(),
784                    geometry.getContext()));
785          }
786          builder.append("))");
787          builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
788        }
789      } else {
790        withinGeometry = within.getGeometry();
791      }
792      builder
793          .append("contains('")
794          .append(withinGeometry)
795          .append("', ")
796          .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
797          .append(", ")
798          .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude));
799      // Without the "= TRUE", the expression may evaluate to TRUE or FALSE for all records,
800      // depending
801      // on the data format (ORC, Avro, Parquet, text) of the table (!).
802      // We could not reproduce the issue on our test cluster, so it seems safest to include this.
803      builder.append(") = TRUE").append(')');
804    } catch (Exception e) {
805      throw new QueryBuildingException(e);
806    }
807  }
808
809  public void visit(GeoDistancePredicate geoDistance) throws QueryBuildingException {
810    builder
811        .append("(geoDistance(")
812        .append(geoDistance.getGeoDistance().getLatitude())
813        .append(", ")
814        .append(geoDistance.getGeoDistance().getLongitude())
815        .append(", '")
816        .append(geoDistance.getGeoDistance().getDistance().toString())
817        .append("', ")
818        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
819        .append(", ")
820        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude))
821        .append(") = TRUE)");
822  }
823
824  /**
825   * Given a bounding box, generates greater than / lesser than queries using decimalLatitude and
826   * decimalLongitude to form a bounding box.
827   */
828  private void boundingBox(Rectangle bounds) {
829    builder
830        .append('(')
831        // Latitude is easy:
832        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
833        .append(GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
834        .append(bounds.getMinY())
835        .append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
836        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
837        .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
838        .append(bounds.getMaxY())
839        .append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
840
841        // Longitude must take account of crossing the antimeridian:
842        .append('(')
843        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude))
844        .append(GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
845        .append(bounds.getMinX());
846    if (bounds.getMinX() < bounds.getMaxX()) {
847      builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
848    } else {
849      builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
850    }
851    builder
852        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude))
853        .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
854        .append(bounds.getMaxX())
855        .append(')')
856        .append(')');
857  }
858
859  /**
860   * Builds a list of predicates joined by 'op' statements. The final statement will look like this:
861   *
862   * <p>
863   *
864   * <pre>
865   * ((predicate) op (predicate) ... op (predicate))
866   * </pre>
867   */
868  public void visitCompoundPredicate(CompoundPredicate predicate, String op)
869      throws QueryBuildingException {
870    builder.append('(');
871    Iterator<Predicate> iterator = predicate.getPredicates().iterator();
872    while (iterator.hasNext()) {
873      Predicate subPredicate = iterator.next();
874      builder.append('(');
875      visit(subPredicate);
876      builder.append(')');
877      if (iterator.hasNext()) {
878        builder.append(op);
879      }
880    }
881    builder.append(')');
882  }
883
884  public void visitSimplePredicate(SimplePredicate<S> predicate, String op)
885      throws QueryBuildingException {
886    if (Number.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
887      if (SearchTypeValidator.isNumericRange(predicate.getValue())) {
888        if (Integer.class.equals(predicate.getKey().type())) {
889          visit(
890              toIntegerRangePredicate(
891                  SearchTypeValidator.parseIntegerRange(predicate.getValue()), predicate.getKey()));
892        } else {
893          visit(
894              toNumberRangePredicate(
895                  SearchTypeValidator.parseDecimalRange(predicate.getValue()), predicate.getKey()));
896        }
897        return;
898      }
899    }
900
901    if (sqlTermsMapper.includeNullInPredicate(predicate)) {
902      String column = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLColumn(term(predicate.getKey()));
903      builder
904          .append('(')
905          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
906          .append(op)
907          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
908          .append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
909          .append(
910              isSQLArray(predicate.getKey())
911                  ? String.format(IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, column)
912                  : column + IS_NULL_OPERATOR)
913          .append(')');
914    } else {
915      builder
916          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
917          .append(op)
918          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), predicate.isMatchCase()));
919    }
920  }
921
922  public void visitSimplePredicate(SimplePredicate<S> predicate, String op, String value)
923      throws QueryBuildingException {
924    if (sqlTermsMapper.includeNullInPredicate(predicate)) {
925      String column = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLColumn(term(predicate.getKey()));
926      builder
927          .append('(')
928          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
929          .append(op)
930          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), value, predicate.isMatchCase()))
931          .append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
932          .append(
933              isSQLArray(predicate.getKey())
934                  ? String.format(IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, column)
935                  : column + IS_NULL_OPERATOR)
936          .append(')');
937    } else {
938      builder
939          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
940          .append(op)
941          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), value, predicate.isMatchCase()));
942    }
943  }
944
945  /** Determines if the parameter type is a Hive array. */
946  protected boolean isSQLArray(S parameter) {
947    return SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLType(term(parameter)).startsWith(SQL_ARRAY_PRE);
948  }
949
950  /** Term associated to a search parameter */
951  public Term term(S parameter) {
952    return sqlTermsMapper.term(parameter);
953  }
954
955  private void appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(String checklistKey, S parameter, String value) {
956    Objects.requireNonNull(checklistKey);
957
958    String field = HUMBOLDT_TAXON_COLUMNS.getOrDefault(parameter, null);
959
960    if (field == null) {
961      return;
962    }
963
964    builder
965        .append('(')
966        .append(
967            String.format(
968                "stringArrayContains(%s['%s']['%s'], '%s', true)",
969                SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(EcoTerm.targetTaxonomicScope),
970                getChecklistKey(checklistKey),
971                field,
972                value))
973        .append(')');
974  }
975
976  private void appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(EqualsPredicate<S> taxonPredicate) {
977    appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(
978        getChecklistKey(taxonPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
979        taxonPredicate.getKey(),
980        taxonPredicate.getValue());
981  }
982
983  private void appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(InPredicate<S> taxonPredicate) {
984    String field = HUMBOLDT_TAXON_COLUMNS.getOrDefault(taxonPredicate.getKey(), null);
985
986    if (field == null) {
987      return;
988    }
989
990    Set<String> taxonKeys =
991        taxonPredicate.getValues().stream()
992            .map(v -> toSQLValue(taxonPredicate.getKey(), v, true))
993            .collect(Collectors.toSet());
994
995    builder
996        .append('(')
997        .append(
998            String.format(
999                "arrays_overlap(%s['%s']['%s'], array(%s))",
1000                SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(EcoTerm.targetTaxonomicScope),
1001                getChecklistKey(taxonPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
1002                field,
1003                String.join(",", taxonKeys)))
1004        .append(')');
1005  }
1006
1007  private void appendHumboldtTaxonUnary(String checklistKey, String unaryOperator) {
1008    Objects.requireNonNull(checklistKey);
1009    builder.append('(');
1010    builder.append(
1011        String.format(
1012            "%s['%s']['%s'] " + unaryOperator,
1013            SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(EcoTerm.targetTaxonomicScope),
1014            getChecklistKey(checklistKey),
1015            "usageName"));
1016    builder.append(')');
1017  }
1018
1019  /**
1020   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank.
1021   *
1022   * @param taxonKeyPredicate to append as filter
1023   */
1024  private void appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(EqualsPredicate<S> taxonKeyPredicate, Term term) {
1025
1026    builder
1027        .append('(')
1028        .append(
1029            String.format(
1030                "stringArrayContains(%s['%s'], '%s', true)",
1031                SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term),
1032                getChecklistKey(taxonKeyPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
1033                taxonKeyPredicate.getValue()))
1034        .append(')');
1035  }
1036
1037  /**
1038   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank.
1039   *
1040   * @param taxonKeyPredicate to append as filter
1041   */
1042  private void appendTaxonomicSingleValueFilter(EqualsPredicate<S> taxonKeyPredicate, Term term) {
1043
1044    builder
1045        .append('(')
1046        .append(
1047            String.format(
1048                "%s['%s'] = '%s'",
1049                SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term),
1050                getChecklistKey(taxonKeyPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
1051                taxonKeyPredicate.getValue()))
1052        .append(')');
1053  }
1054
1055  /** Creates a disjunction of all the given terms. */
1056  private void appendGadmFilterList(List<? extends Term> terms, String value) {
1057    builder
1058        .append('(')
1059        .append(
1060            terms.stream()
1061                .map(
1062                    term ->
1063                        SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term)
1064                            + EQUALS_OPERATOR
1065                            + "'"
1066                            + value
1067                            + "'")
1068                .collect(Collectors.joining(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR)))
1069        .append(')');
1070  }
1071
1072  /**
1073   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank, for multiple keys.
1074   *
1075   * @param taxonomicPredicate to append as filter
1076   */
1077  private void appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(InPredicate<S> taxonomicPredicate, Term term) {
1078    Set<String> taxonKeys =
1079        taxonomicPredicate.getValues().stream()
1080            .map(v -> toSQLValue(taxonomicPredicate.getKey(), v, true))
1081            .collect(Collectors.toSet());
1082
1083    builder
1084        .append('(')
1085        .append(
1086            String.format(
1087                "arrays_overlap(%s['%s'], array(%s))",
1088                SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term),
1089                getChecklistKey(taxonomicPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
1090                String.join(",", taxonKeys)))
1091        .append(')');
1092  }
1093
1094  /**
1095   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank, for multiple keys.
1096   *
1097   * @param taxonomicPredicate to append as filter
1098   */
1099  private void appendTaxonomicSingleValueFilter(InPredicate<S> taxonomicPredicate, Term term) {
1100
1101    Collection<String> taxonKeys = taxonomicPredicate.getValues();
1102
1103    builder.append('(');
1104    boolean first = true;
1105    for (String taxonKey : taxonKeys) {
1106      if (!first) {
1107        builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
1108      }
1109      builder
1110          .append('(')
1111          .append(
1112              String.format(
1113                  "%s['%s'] = '%s'",
1114                  SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term),
1115                  getChecklistKey(taxonomicPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
1116                  taxonKey))
1117          .append(')');
1118      first = false;
1119    }
1120    builder.append(')');
1121  }
1122
1123  /**
1124   * Searches every level of GADM GID in Hive for multiple keys.
1125   *
1126   * @param gadmGids to append as filter
1127   */
1128  private void appendGadmGidFilter(Collection<String> gadmGids) {
1129    builder.append('(');
1130    boolean first = true;
1131    for (Term term : GADM_GIDS) {
1132      if (!first) {
1133        builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
1134      }
1135      builder.append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term)).append(IN_OPERATOR).append('(');
1136      Iterator<String> iterator = gadmGids.iterator();
1137      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
1138        // Hardcoded GADM_LEVEL_0_GID since the type of all these parameters is the same.
1139        // Using .toUpperCase() is safe, GIDs must be ASCII anyway.
1140        builder.append(
1141            toSQLValue(sqlTermsMapper.getDefaultGadmLevel(), iterator.next().toUpperCase(), true));
1142        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
1143          builder.append(", ");
1144        }
1145      }
1146      builder.append(")");
1147      first = false;
1148    }
1149    builder.append(')');
1150  }
1151
1152  /**
1153   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank.
1154   *
1155   * @param unaryOperator to append as filter
1156   */
1157  private void appendUnaryList(List<? extends Term> terms, String unaryOperator) {
1158    builder.append('(');
1159    builder.append(
1160        terms.stream()
1161            .map(term -> SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term) + unaryOperator)
1162            .collect(Collectors.joining(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)));
1163    builder.append(')');
1164  }
1165
1166  /**
1167   * Converts decimal range into a predicate with the form: field >= range.lower AND field <=
1168   * range.upper.
1169   */
1170  private Predicate toNumberRangePredicate(Range<Double> range, S key) {
1171    if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
1172      return new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1173          key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().doubleValue()));
1174    }
1175    if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
1176      return new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1177          key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().doubleValue()));
1178    }
1179
1180    List<Predicate> predicates =
1181        List.of(
1182            new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1183                key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().doubleValue())),
1184            new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1185                key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().doubleValue())));
1186    return new ConjunctionPredicate(predicates);
1187  }
1188
1189  /**
1190   * Converts integer range into a predicate with the form: field >= range.lower AND field <=
1191   * range.upper.
1192   */
1193  private Predicate toIntegerRangePredicate(Range<Integer> range, S key) {
1194    if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
1195      return new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1196          key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().intValue()));
1197    }
1198    if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
1199      return new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1200          key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().intValue()));
1201    }
1202
1203    List<Predicate> predicates =
1204        List.of(
1205            new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1206                key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().intValue())),
1207            new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1208                key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().intValue())));
1209    return new ConjunctionPredicate(predicates);
1210  }
1211
1212  private void visit(Object object) throws QueryBuildingException {
1213    Method method = null;
1214    try {
1215      method = getClass().getMethod("visit", new Class[] {object.getClass()});
1216    } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
1217      log.warn(
1218          "Visit method could not be found. That means a unknown Predicate has been passed", e);
1219      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown Predicate", e);
1220    }
1221    try {
1222      method.invoke(this, object);
1223    } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
1224      log.error(
1225          "This error shouldn't occur if all visit methods are public. Probably a programming error",
1226          e);
1227      throw new RuntimeException(e);
1228    } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
1229      log.info("Exception thrown while building the query", e);
1230      throw new QueryBuildingException(e);
1231    }
1232  }
1233
1234  private boolean isHumboldtTaxonParameter(S parameter) {
1235    return HUMBOLDT_TAXON_COLUMNS.containsKey(parameter);
1236  }
1237
1238  private String getChecklistKey(String checklistKey) {
1239    return !isNullOrEmpty(checklistKey) ? checklistKey : defaultChecklistKey;
1240  }
1241
1242  public static boolean isNullOrEmpty(@Nullable String string) {
1243    return string == null || string.isEmpty();
1244  }
1245}
